scenario.name: Examine names of scenario and feature

docString.content:
Feature: Feature name

  Scenario: Scenario name
    Given a step

names = []
Before do |scenario|
  expect(scenario).to_not respond_to(:scenario_outline)
  names << scenario.feature.name.split("\n").first
  names << scenario.name.split("\n").first
  if(names.size == 2)
    raise "NAMES:\n" + names.join("\n") + "\n"
  end
end

scenario.name: Examine names of scenario outline and feature

names = []

end
